about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the authentic driving experience of Berlin's public transport system with the new add-on Berlin - Line 300 for the bus simulator OMSI 2. This breathtaking route takes you from the famous Philharmonie concert hall via Potsdamer Platz and Alexanderplatz to the Warschauer Straße underground and suburban railway station. It offers an unrivalled insight into one of Europe's most fascinating cities as it was in summer 2021.

Experience the pulsating metropolis on a route that takes you right through the heart of Berlin and connects East and West. And as befits a big city, there are plenty of roadworks on the route that challenge the bus drivers' skills. During the journey on route 300, you pass numerous sights, including the Humboldt Forum, the Rotes Rathaus and many other famous places such as the boulevard Unter den Linden. Numerous buildings and sights on the route have been specially realised for this extension.

The included bus, a Solaris Urbino IV 18 electric, is another highlight of this OMSI map. The model has been faithfully reproduced inside and out and offers an authentic driving experience. From the unique, future-oriented dashboard to the functioning interior displays and the original sound, the virtual realisation was carried out with great attention to detail.

With its comfortable features, impressive design and first-class performance, you will feel like a real Berlin bus driver. The announcements in the bus have the current sound design of the Berlin transport company, which also enables visually or hearing-impaired passengers to hear the correct stop or the transfer options acoustically.

Experience Berlin in a completely new way with the Berlin Line 300 add-on for the OMSI 2 bus simulator. Whether you are an experienced simulator driver or a novice, this programme offers you an unforgettable journey through an exciting city.


Features:
  • One of the most exciting east-west bus routes you can take in Berlin
  • Over 200 customised and detailed objects of numerous places of interest
  • A Solaris Urbino IV 18 metre electric articulated bus with prototypical equipment is included
  • Authentic Atron ticket printer
  • Current Berlin sound design with professionally recorded announcements
  • Performance-friendly design thanks to the primary use of 3D intersection objects instead of splines
  • Numerous other details such as vehicles of the Berlin city cleaning service, fire brigade, many realistic construction sites and e-scooters (static models), as well as graffiti and rubbish
  • Authentic billboards that change dynamically
  • Typical sounds at various points along the route (railway stations, construction sites, city traffic)

Please note:
Simultaneous use of the OMSI 2 Add-on Berlin Line 300 and the OMSI 2 Add-on Enhanced Environment Pack (EEP) can lead to performance losses in the simulation.
We strongly advise you to deactivate the Add-on EEP when using the Berlin Line 300 Add-on and not to use these two Add-Ons at the same time.

name: OMSI 2 Add-on Berlin Line 300

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core, e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2,048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Experience Berlin in a completely new way with the Berlin Line 300 add-on for the OMSI 2 bus simulator. Whether you are an experienced simulator driver or a novice, this programme offers you an unforgettable journey through an exciting city.
supported_languages:
English, German*, French
*languages with full audio support
